name: Boss Parade
description:
Our submission for 4th Vaultacular Game Jam! Battle against deadly parade floats come to life in this auto-scrolling action game! Play as Morris, Caine or Archie as they confront the Demon Lord and his legion!

[noblelemon] - programming and art

Reignited_Inferno - art, sounds and music

CyclopicSpider - art, concept art

PineappleInk - art, concept art

Secbot - music

TwiGinTec - art
